title: 법률 계약서 작성 및 검토
intent: 법률 계약서의 핵심 조항을 정확히 작성하고 법적 효력을 고려하여 검토한다.
lexset: contract, clause, provision, obligation, liability, indemnity, termination, breach, covenant, warranty
domain_vocabulary: plaintiff, defendant, litigation, arbitration, jurisdiction, precedent, statute, regulation, compliance, fiduciary
traps: shall vs will vs may 법적 구분

seeds.kr: 계약 당사자는 다음 조건을 준수해야 합니다.
seeds.en: The contracting parties shall comply with the following terms.
This agreement shall be legally binding.

seeds.kr: 계약 위반 시 손해배상 책임이 발생합니다.
seeds.en: Breach of contract shall result in liability for damages.
Disputes shall be resolved through arbitration proceedings.
The competent court shall govern this contract.
The indemnity clause applies to specific circumstances.

seeds.kr: 계약 해지 통지는 서면으로 해야 합니다.
seeds.en: Termination notice must be provided in writing.
Warranty provisions are specified in the contract.
Fiduciary duties must not be breached.
Legal precedent applies to this case.
